comments.author: hopenotlate
comments.body: Considering your previous postQuote from: makingmoney479 on June 21, 2023, 01:11:39 PMThe Account is level 2 verified, and will always be eligible for bonuses.Currently sitting at 12% progression to Plat 2 (which will give you 500$ as a level up bonus).With minimal amount wager you currently get:Pre + Post Monthly: 15$ eachMonthly: 15-30$Weekly: 5-10$With 7k$ wagered this month i got:Pre + Post Monthly: 15$ eachMonthly: 55$Weekly: 15$ eachWagering some money drastically increases the Monthly and Weekly bonuses.Im asking for 100$ in cryptoScammers dont waste my time, escrow and you pay the fees.this loan request looks like a Stake  account selling in disguise.Good luck with it.

comments.author: Timelord2067
comments.body: Quote from: makingmoney479 on November 01, 2023, 10:48:45 PMLOAN AMOUNT: 100 USDTREASON: I lost a lot of money gambling last week(a few oversized bets), and I need to pay my bills till my next salary(1000usdt 9 of November)REPAYMENT: 115 USDTREPAYMENT DATE: 10/11/23 or earlierCOLLAT: Stake account, platinum 1, weekly, monthly will be big, since I lost a lot last weekYour loan application looks a whole lot like this one:Quote from: hedgeprx on October 29, 2023, 05:04:32 AMLOAN AMOUNT: 0.031 BTC/ $1650REASON: PERSONALREPAYMENT: 0.035 BTCREPAYMENT DATE: 08/11/23COLLAT: 1150 USDT Right down to "collat" in the title and application...Not to mention your Date Registered:    2023-06-21, 22:50:54 with just four posts in that time...Just like hedgeprx Date Registered:    2023-07-02, 19:34:31 and just two posts this week.

comments.body: Quote from: Timelord2067 on November 02, 2023, 09:02:23 AMQuote from: makingmoney479 on November 01, 2023, 10:48:45 PMLOAN AMOUNT: 100 USDTREASON: I lost a lot of money gambling last week(a few oversized bets), and I need to pay my bills till my next salary(1000usdt 9 of November)REPAYMENT: 115 USDTREPAYMENT DATE: 10/11/23 or earlierCOLLAT: Stake account, platinum 1, weekly, monthly will be big, since I lost a lot last weekYour loan application looks a whole lot like this one:Quote from: hedgeprx on October 29, 2023, 05:04:32 AMLOAN AMOUNT: 0.031 BTC/ $1650REASON: PERSONALREPAYMENT: 0.035 BTCREPAYMENT DATE: 08/11/23COLLAT: 1150 USDT Right down to "collat" in the title and application...Not to mention your Date Registered:    2023-06-21, 22:50:54 with just four posts in that time...Just like hedgeprx Date Registered:    2023-07-02, 19:34:31 and just two posts this week.Yeah, I just copied the previous thread. I thought it was okay, and I don't see the problem here.What do you mean? In your logic, is it my account or what? Like, both registered in 2023 and have few posts, so it's two mine accs? Maybe all accounts that registered in 2023 have a few posts are mine? Nice allegations. Remember to take your meds.I am entirely okay with hearing "NO" and not getting the loan, even without arguments, but are you wasting your time inventing crazy theories just to increase your post count? Or are you just desperate for attention?Quote from: HedgeFx on November 02, 2023, 09:12:15 AMYes, is the same idiot .He is only a troll, no address posted.Quote from: Timelord2067 on November 02, 2023, 09:02:23 AMQuote from: makingmoney479 on November 01, 2023, 10:48:45 PMLOAN AMOUNT: 100 USDTREASON: I lost a lot of money gambling last week(a few oversized bets), and I need to pay my bills till my next salary(1000usdt 9 of November)REPAYMENT: 115 USDTREPAYMENT DATE: 10/11/23 or earlierCOLLAT: Stake account, platinum 1, weekly, monthly will be big, since I lost a lot last weekYour loan application looks a whole lot like this one:Quote from: hedgeprx on October 29, 2023, 05:04:32 AMLOAN AMOUNT: 0.031 BTC/ $1650REASON: PERSONALREPAYMENT: 0.035 BTCREPAYMENT DATE: 08/11/23COLLAT: 1150 USDT Right down to "collat" in the title and application...Not to mention your Date Registered:    2023-06-21, 22:50:54 with just four posts in that time...Just like hedgeprx Date Registered:    2023-07-02, 19:34:31 and just two posts this week.I am not trolling. comments.author: AHOYBRAUSE
comments.body: Just for future reference, and to point out how WORTHLESS stake accounts are.If you don't wager for 3-4 weeks your weekly bonus is 0.08$, your monthly is 1$ , just es pre and post monthly."since I lost a lot last week" is also quite vague. For some people losing 100-200$ is a lot. Of course already knew already how worthless they are, just wanted to point out the real numbers, and not whatever OP said in the other post.
